name: bbc-news-headlines
title: BBC News Headlines
description: Read the latest BBC News headlines
author: gerardkeane

commands.name: bbc-news
commands.title: Show Latest Headlines
commands.subtitle: BBC News
commands.description: Display the latest headlines from the BBC News RSS feed.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
